Package Pacman.Model

Class Pacman.Model.Game extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: -7882479042847476243L

Serialized Fields

state

GameState state
This holds the state of the game.

score

int score
How many points the player has scored so far.

map

Map map
The map, containing all the MapBlocks.

originalMap

Map originalMap
Once the player eats dots, the map is altered. After the game is finished, the originalMap needs to be restored.

player

Player player
The player object.

ghosts

Ghost[] ghosts
The ghosts.

specialItemMode

boolean specialItemMode
Stores whether special item mode is activated.

specialItemTimeOut

java.util.Date specialItemTimeOut
Stores the point in time when the special item mode will be deactivated.

Class Pacman.Model.GameCharacter extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 7912879199590140180L

Serialized Fields

stepSize

double stepSize
This controls how much the position vector is displaced with each step the character takes.

position

Vector position
Vector of position of GameCharacter

direction

Vector direction
Vector that points in the direction of movement. Should be normed!

active

boolean active
flag, whether the character is currently active (mostly for the thread)

speed

long speed
speed of the character. Used for sleep time in the thread

nextTurn

Direction nextTurn
when the user presses an arrow key or the ghost changes the direction, this variable will be set and the player will then turn in that direction at the next possible opportunity

Class Pacman.Model.Ghost extends GameCharacter implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: -8247574508495075853L

Serialized Fields

dead

boolean dead
Stores whether the ghost is currently dead.

ghostType

int ghostType
There are four ghost types. They only differ in the image that is drawn to represent them in the view.

Serialized Fields

ghostCount

int ghostCount
The number of ghosts in the game

blocks

MapBlock[][] blocks
The blocks that make up the map

ghostSpawnPoint

int[] ghostSpawnPoint
The point where ghosts are spawned, expressed in grid coordinates.

playerSpawnPoint

int[] playerSpawnPoint
The point where the player is spawned, expressed in grid coordinates.

dotsLeft

int dotsLeft
How many dots are left for the player to eat.

Class Pacman.View.GUI extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1524894064265063998L

Serialized Fields

startButton

javax.swing.JButton startButton
Start button starts the game. It can also function as a pause button.

stopButton

javax.swing.JButton stopButton
Stop button stops the game.

editorButton

javax.swing.JButton editorButton
Toggles the editor.

saveButton

javax.swing.JButton saveButton
to save the game or map, depending on state.

loadButton

javax.swing.JButton loadButton
to load the game or map, depending on state.

javax.swing.JToggleButton toolButtonDot
Selects Dot as the current tool.

Selects Special as the current tool.

Selects Empty as the current tool.

Selects GhostSpawn as the current tool.

toolButtonPlayerSpawn

javax.swing.JToggleButton toolButtonPlayerSpawn
